trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for many visual elements of the chart such as the legend, title, and chart areas.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于许多可视化元素，如图例、 标题和图表区在图表的基类。

trans-unit.source: Defines the position of the chart element in relative coordinates, which range from (0,0) to (100,100).
trans-unit.target: 以相对坐标，范围是从 (0，0) 到 (100100) 定义图表元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: The ElementPosition class is used to define the position of a chart element, and represents one rectangle using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: ElementPosition 类可用于定义图表元素的位置，并表示一个矩形使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Height%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ElementPosition class is always exposed as a `Position` property, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: ElementPosition 类始终作为公开`Position`属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>，依次类推。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is also exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control as a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 它还公开了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件的属性作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>

trans-unit.source: The position of the applicable chart elements can be set automatically by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> property to `true`; chart elements can also be positioned at design time in the Design View.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置自动集适用的图表元素的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>属性`true`; 也可以在设计时在设计视图中定位的图表元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two major differences between this class and a <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> structure: - This class can use automatic positioning.
trans-unit.target: 有两个此类之间的主要差异和<xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>结构:-此类可以使用自动定位。</xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>

trans-unit.source: - This class only uses coordinates ranging from 0 to 100, otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: -此类仅使用范围从 0 到 100 的坐标，否则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The position of chart elements is described using relative coordinates, with the top-left corner of an element having coordinates of (0,0) and the bottom-right corner of an element having coordinates of (100,100).
trans-unit.target: 元素的坐标为 (0，0) 的左上角和右下角的坐标为 (100100) 的元素中使用相对坐标，描述的图表元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are plotted within a chart area use coordinates that are relative to the chart area, whereas elements outside a chart area use coordinates that are relative to the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 绘制图表区域中的元素使用相对于图表区的坐标，而图表区之外的元素使用相对于图表图像的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified x, y, width and height parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例使用指定的类 x ， y ， width 和 height 参数。

trans-unit.source: The X position of the top-left corner of the chart control.
trans-unit.target: 图表控件的左上角的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: The Y position of the top-left corner of the chart control.
trans-unit.target: 图表控件的左上角的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: The width of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an applicable chart element will be positioned automatically by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动定位适用的图表元素<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to automatically position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性可自动定位图表元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, to position the legend automatically, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property to Auto.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要自动定位图例，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>Auto.属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an applicable chart element will be positioned automatically by the chart control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果通过图表控件，则将自动定位适用的图表元素否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom position of a chart element, in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表元素，以相对坐标的底部位置。

trans-unit.source: The bottom of the chart element is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素底部始终以相对坐标表示和则相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: Chart coordinates use (0,0) for a top-left corner, and (100,100) for a bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 图表右下角坐标以及左上角 (100100) 的使用 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the relative position of the bottom of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图表元素底部的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object from a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref>对象<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure used to initialize the element position object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>结构用来初始化元素位置对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图表元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: Always uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 始终使用相对坐标。

trans-unit.source: If you set a value outside of the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值超过 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the height of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图表元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the right side of a chart element, in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表元素的右侧以相对坐标的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the relative position of the right side of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，表示右端的适用的图表元素的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: The right side position is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: 右侧位置始终以相对坐标表示和则相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: Chart coordinates use (0,0) for a top-left corner, and (100,100) for a bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 图表右下角坐标以及左上角 (100100) 的使用 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the relative position of the right side of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示右侧的图表元素的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> value that represents the size of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>值，该值表示图表元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses the coordinates of an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>对象，它使用的坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the position of an element to a <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换到元素的位置<xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>结构。</xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the coordinates of an element position object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>结构，它表示元素位置对象的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图表元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property always uses relative coordinates; if you set a value outside the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终使用相对坐标;如果你设置的值超出了 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the width of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图表元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative X-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个适用的图表元素的左上角的相对 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The X property is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: 该 X 属性始终以相对坐标表示，并且是相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: This property always uses relative coordinates; if you set a value outside the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终使用相对坐标;如果你设置的值超出了 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the X-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref>值，表示适用的图表元素的左上角的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个适用的图表元素的左上角的相对 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The Y property is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: 该 Y 属性始终以相对坐标表示，并且是相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: This property always uses relative coordinates; if you set a value outside the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终使用相对坐标;如果你设置的值超出了 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref>表示适用的图表元素的左上角的 Y 坐标的值。
